verbs.description: [V: is] obiano trying to demystify the church in anambra by fredrick nwabufo but the church appears savagely undermined in anambra under governor obiano the governor who rose to power on the coattails of the church now spits in its face with flagrant disobedience and disrespect of its bishops reneging on promises and desecrating agreements governor obiano peter obi africa twitter anambra sahara reporters facebook fredricknwabufo fredrick fredrick nwabufo
